column3: It doesn't seem that bad lately. We also have intermittent failures on travis, so I am not sure if this will improve things significantly.

@MarcoFalke said

> but a failing test wouldn't mark a pull request red in the pull request overview tab

Personally I go and see what failed so I'm fine with having it red.

I may be wrong but with this change we might end up not taking care of appveyor failures.
